extDescription.message: A tab management sidebar with tree structure and advanced features.

om_newtab_1.message: Double Left Mouse Button on an empty area.

om_newtab_2.message: Right-click context menu on a empty area.

om_newtab_3.message: Right-click context menu on a tab.

om_newtab_4.message: Right-click context menu while holding Left-Control on a tab to create it as a child.

om_closetab_1.message: Swipe to the right by holding Left Mouse Button.

om_closetab_4.message: Right-click context menu while holding Left-Control to close tab's children.

om_mutetab_1.message: Left Mouse Button on the status bar.

om_selecttab_1.message: Wheel Mouse cycle between tabs. If you go past the last tab, the first one is selected.

om_selecttab_2.message: The classical Left Mouse Button works too.

om_reordertabs_1.message: Hold Left-Control, then use and maintain Left Mouse Button to drag a tab.

om_reordertabs_2.message: Dragging a tab onto the top of another tab places it above it, as a sibling.

om_reordertabs_3.message: Dragging a tab onto the bottom of another tab places it below it, as a child.

om_reordertabs_4.message: Drag and drop a tab supports differents windows.

om_other_1.message: Holding Left-Control when opening the Right-click context menu on a tab will modify some options (bookmark children instead of only the selected tab, close children instead of only the selected tab, etc).

om_other_2.message: Hover a button of the Right-click context menu displays a tooltip with its name.

om_other_3.message: Hover a tab displays a tooltip with its title.

om_other_4.message: Special logic is applied to activate a tab when another tab is closed with Tabstree (and not with the browser).

om_other_5.message: Putting a tab to hibernation frees up memory. The page will be reloaded when it is selected again. This can't be done on a currently active tab.
